message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $10000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm currently looking to keep my investment within $8000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9000?

Bob, I understand your budget.  I'm willing to come down a little more to $9500, but that's as low as I can go.  This product is truly worth the value, and I'm confident it will be a great asset to your business.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering the value of the product and staying within my budget, I propose we agree on a price of $9000.
